newsitem.title: USA: Universal Stainless stake cut by investor.
newsitem.headline: Universal Stainless stake cut by investor.

text.p: Edelson Technology Partners III LP, a Woodcliff Lake, N.J. investment firm, said Monday it has reduced its stake in Universal Stainless & Alloy Products Inc to 312,500 shares or a 4.9 percent stake.
In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the firm said it most recently sold a net 107,000 shares at an average price of $13.29 each.
